title: Battery draining fast after Android 11 update
content:
Updated my pixel 3 to Android 11 and now it's charging faster but the battery is draining even faster. I'm able to use the phone for about an hour after a 100% charge before the battery percentage begins to go down like a timer, then subsequently goes off.  
I have uninstalled apps, done a factory reset, however the problem still persist.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
